title: HOUSE PANEL IS SETTING TERMS FOR DEBATE ON ALIENS
body:
House Rules Committee is expected to vote Sept 16 on resolution setting terms for full House debate on 
comprehensive immigration bill that would prohibit employers from hiring illegal aliens; bill is expected to come to 
floor of House later in Sept; some supporters, fearing changes would upset delicate balance of bill, urge committee 
to issue rule barring amendments to key provisions (M)
